details: Analysis: Access Vector: Local Layer: Userland Root Causes: Heap Buffer Overflow SRS Categories: - Android Security SRS Category: Memory Safety Writeup: A stack trace alone with PoC app is insufficient to determine if this represents a genuine memory corruption vulnerability reachable by an untrusted application. However, adhering to security principle  we always assume the worst-case scenario. Bluetooth team, if you believe this does not constitute a valid security issue, please provide your reasoning, and we will adjust the rating accordingly.
